data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Komi, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Komi, Russia

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Komi, Russia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Komi, Russia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Komi to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Mansi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Mansi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Mansi people is yours.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Komi to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Komi, Russia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the state of Komi, Russia has a population of 901,200.

We estimate Komi has 13,189 people who might know Jesus, 505,827 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 382,184 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 13,189 believers in Komi to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
